translation: He who, through the likeness of the Self, O Arjuna, sees reality everywhere, be it pleasure or pain, is regarded as the highest Yogi.
commentary: 6.32 Atmaupamyena through the likeness of the Self? Everywhere everywhere? Equal eality? sees sees? who who? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Sukham pleasure? or and? If if? or or? suffering pain? He he? Yogi Yogi? The highest highest? Matah is regarded.Commentary He sees that whatever is pleasure or pain to himself is also pleasure or pain to all other beings. He doesn't harm anyone. He is ite harmless. He wishes everyone well.
